ticker: Return every Saturday night for live DJs!
Join our Discord and the VRChat group using the buttons on the station concourse!
The ampwave that runs this LED sign is powered by french toast, and the odd Gregg's sausage, bean and cheese pasty. Other pasty is also acceptable as bribes.
Remember to remain internally moist and hydrate at regular intervals throughout your journey today.
Get all station announcements via our Discord and the VRChat group. Use the buttons on the station concourse!

performers.name: Jay Cee Beats
ticker: Please welcome newest DJ! Taking us tonight to both Hardcore and Frenchcore!
Follow Jaycee at https://www.youtube.com/@Jayceebeatsmusic1988

performers.name: Liquid Bass
ticker: Calling tonight at Hardstyle, only.
Follow Liquid at https://linktr.ee/djliquidbass

performers.name: Ovtlvndish
ticker: This service is calling at Garage House and UK Garage.
However, despite that this DJ is playing Garage, please note that there is no parking permitted anywhere on the station concourse. Except maybe for Vibe Car.
Follow Ovtlvndish at https://twitter.com/Outland1shVR

performers.name: Japhet
ticker: Express service to: Mainstage House
'Remember to be the change you want to see'
Follow Japhet at https://twitter.com/MSGspike

performers.name: V[AI]RUS
ticker: Final train, calling at Rawtempo and return service to Frenchcore. We've come full circle (line)!
Follow V[AI]RUS at https://twitter.com/v_ai_rus

performers.name: **TERMINATES HERE**
ticker: This event terminates here. We wish you the best with your onward journey!
See you all next week!
